org.openscience.cdk.smiles

Class DeduceBondSystemTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.smiles.DeduceBondSystemTool

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.smiles.DeduceBondSystemToolTest")
public class DeduceBondSystemTool
extends Object
    Tool that tries to deduce bond orders based on connectivity and hybridization for a number of common ring systems of up to seven-membered rings.

    The calculation can be interrupted with setInterrupted(boolean), but assumes that this class is not used in a threaded fashion. When a calculation is interrupted, the boolean is reset to false.

    Author:
    Todd Martin
    Keywords:
    bond order
    Belongs to CDK module:
    smiles
    This class is affected by these bug(s):
    1895805 1931262
    Thread Safe: No
    Source code:
    HEAD
